title: Comment on 100 Men On “Would You Date Someone Who Slept With You On The First Date?” by Seks op de eerste date? Dit is waarom jij je niet schuldig hoeft te voelen | FEM FEM
text:
http://www.itmakesmestronger.com/2013/08/100-men-on-%e2%80%9cwould-you-date-someone-who-slept-with-you-on-the-first-date%e2%80%9d-2/ Only L<3Ve @ ItMakesMeStronger.com 
[…] Thought Catalog » Love & Sex […] 
Reblogged this on Kiss & tell – Adventures in the world of dating and commented: What do YOU think? Sex on the first date, hot or not? 
I say whatever goes, goes, although I tend to think it’s more mysterious and sexy to hold off for a bit, but chemistry is chemistry and if the sparks are flying why the hell not. You never really truly know someone, but you can usually smell a dog a mile away. BUT, all that being said… if the dates are sparse, I may cave sooner than expected if he plays his cards right ;) Mind you, if Gerard Butler came to my door, there would be no date. I would be ALL OVER that shit!! Just sayin’ http://faithskye.wordpress.com/2013/08/05/sex-and-self-worth/ Sex and self-worth | raven's chambers
